updatedContent
updatedContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <layer-list xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android">
<!-- White background for the toolbar --> <item> <shape android:shape="rectangle"> <solid android:color="@color/white" /> </shape> </item>
<!-- Black bottom border --> <item android:gravity="bottom"> <shape android:shape="rectangle"> <solid android:color="@color/black" /> <size android:height="1dp" /> </shape> </item>
</layer-list>

option.name: originalContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <androidx.drawerlayout.widget.DrawerLayout
xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools" android:id="@+id/drawer_layout" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:fitsSystemWindows="true" tools:openDrawer="start"> <!--tools:openDrawer="start" [to see nav drawer viwe add this line ]-->
<!-- all the side drawers are implimented here --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:orientation="vertical">
<!-- Toolbar with proper top margin to prevent overflow --> <androidx.appcompat.widget.Toolbar android:id="@+id/toolbar" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="56dp" android:layout_marginTop="24dp" android:background="@color/white" android:elevation="4dp" android:theme="@style/ToolbarTheme" app:contentInsetStart="16dp" app:contentInsetEnd="16dp" app:layout_scrollFlags="scroll|enterAlways" app:popupTheme="@style/ThemeOverlay.AppCompat.Light" />
<FrameLayout android:id="@+id/content_frame" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" />
</LinearLayout> <!--my navigation drawer menue and hedder menue is decleare here--> <com.google.android.material.navigation.NavigationView android:id="@+id/nav_view" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:layout_gravity="start" android:fitsSystemWindows="true" app:headerLayout="@layout/hedder" app:menu="@menu/main_menue" />
</androidx.drawerlayout.widget.DrawerLayout>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <androidx.drawerlayout.widget.DrawerLayout
xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools" android:id="@+id/drawer_layout" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:fitsSystemWindows="true" tools:openDrawer="start"> <!--tools:openDrawer="start" [to see nav drawer viwe add this line ]-->
<!-- all the side drawers are implimented here --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:orientation="vertical">
<!-- Toolbar with proper top margin and bottom border --> <androidx.appcompat.widget.Toolbar android:id="@+id/toolbar" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="56dp" android:layout_marginTop="24dp" android:background="@drawable/toolbar_background_with_border" android:elevation="4dp" android:theme="@style/ToolbarTheme" app:contentInsetStart="16dp" app:contentInsetEnd="16dp" app:layout_scrollFlags="scroll|enterAlways" app:popupTheme="@style/ThemeOverlay.AppCompat.Light" />
<FrameLayout android:id="@+id/content_frame" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" />
</LinearLayout> <!--my navigation drawer menue and hedder menue is decleare here--> <com.google.android.material.navigation.NavigationView android:id="@+id/nav_view" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:layout_gravity="start" android:fitsSystemWindows="true" app:headerLayout="@layout/hedder" app:menu="@menu/main_menue" />
</androidx.drawerlayout.widget.DrawerLayout>

option.name: originalContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:background="@color/white" tools:context=".HomeActivity">
<!-- hrdding text--> <TextView android:id="@+id/txtWelcome" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginStart="50dp" android:layout_marginTop="16dp" android:layout_marginEnd="50dp" android:fontFamily="cursive" android:text="Attractions Near You" android:textAlignment="center" android:textColor="@color/NavyBlue" android:textSize="20sp" android:textStyle="bold" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent" /> <!--filter buttons--> <!-- TODO: more buttons need to add here --> <!--TODO :also need to impliment horicental scroll viwe-->
<com.google.android.material.chip.ChipGroup android:id="@+id/chip_group_filters" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginStart="16dp" android:layout_marginTop="8dp" android:layout_marginEnd="16dp" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/txtWelcome" app:singleSelection="true">
<com.google.android.material.chip.Chip style="@style/Widget.MaterialComponents.Chip.Filter" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:checked="true" android:text="All" />
<com.google.android.material.chip.Chip style="@style/Widget.MaterialComponents.Chip.Filter" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Historical Site" />
<com.google.android.material.chip.Chip style="@style/Widget.MaterialComponents.Chip.Filter" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="WaterFall" />
<com.google.android.material.chip.Chip style="@style/Widget.MaterialComponents.Chip.Filter" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="More" />
</com.google.android.material.chip.ChipGroup>
<!-- Auto populate with data no need to add scrollviwe for this --> <!-- not static this is dynamic s--> <androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView android:id="@+id/recyclerView_attractions" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="0dp" android:layout_marginTop="8dp" android:paddingStart="10dp" android:paddingEnd="10dp" app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/chip_group_filters" tools:listitem="@layout/list_item_attraction" />
<ProgressBar android:id="@+id/progressBar" style="?android:attr/progressBarStyle" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:visibility="gone" app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent" />
</androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:background="@color/white" tools:context=".HomeActivity">
<TextView android:id="@+id/txtWelcome" style="@style/HeadingText" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginStart="50dp" android:layout_marginTop="16dp" android:layout_marginEnd="50dp" android:text="Attractions Near You" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent" />
<com.google.android.material.chip.ChipGroup android:id="@+id/chip_group_filters" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginStart="16dp" android:layout_marginTop="8dp" android:layout_marginEnd="16dp" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/txtWelcome" app:singleSelection="true">
<com.google.android.material.chip.Chip style="@style/Widget.MaterialComponents.Chip.Filter" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:checked="true" android:text="All" app:chipBackgroundColor="@color/DeepForestGreen" android:textColor="@color/GoldYellow" />
<com.google.android.material.chip.Chip style="@style/Widget.MaterialComponents.Chip.Filter" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Historical Site" app:chipBackgroundColor="@color/GoldSand" android:textColor="@color/NavyBlue" />
<com.google.android.material.chip.Chip style="@style/Widget.MaterialComponents.Chip.Filter" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="WaterFall" app:chipBackgroundColor="@color/GoldSand" android:textColor="@color/NavyBlue" />
<com.google.android.material.chip.Chip style="@style/Widget.MaterialComponents.Chip.Filter" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="More" app:chipBackgroundColor="@color/GoldSand" android:textColor="@color/NavyBlue" />
</com.google.android.material.chip.ChipGroup>
<androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView android:id="@+id/recyclerView_attractions" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="0dp" android:layout_marginTop="8dp" android:paddingStart="10dp" android:paddingEnd="10dp" app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/chip_group_filters" tools:listitem="@layout/list_item_attraction" />
<ProgressBar android:id="@+id/progressBar" style="?android:attr/progressBarStyle" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:visibility="gone" android:indeterminateTint="@color/DeepForestGreen" app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent" />
</androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout>

option.name: originalContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools" android:id="@+id/main" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:background="@color/white" android:orientation="vertical" tools:context=".LoginActivity">
<!-- since some mobile phone screens small (spetialy my phone) bottom fetures dosent show so anable the scroll feture --> <!--TODO: Change Logo--> <ScrollView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:fillViewport="true">
<!-- Main Screen--> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_gravity="center" android:layout_marginTop="20dp" android:orientation="vertical" android:paddingBottom="20dp">
<!-- loging widget --> <androidx.cardview.widget.CardView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_margin="30dp" app:cardBackgroundColor="@color/white" app:cardCornerRadius="30dp" app:cardElevation="30dp">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:padding="40dp">
<!-- Logo image--> <ImageView android:layout_width="140dp" android:layout_height="120dp" android:layout_gravity="center_horizontal" android:layout_marginTop="0dp" android:padding="0dp" app:srcCompat="@drawable/hsl_only_logo_transparent_black" /> <!-- login lable--> <TextView android:id="@+id/loginLable" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginBottom="40dp" android:text="@string/Login" android:fontFamily="cursive" android:textAlignment="center" android:textColor="@color/NavyBlue" android:textSize="36sp" android:textStyle="bold" />
<!-- User name input feald --> <EditText android:id="@+id/userName" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginStart="8dp" android:layout_marginEnd="8dp" android:layout_marginBottom="20dp" android:background="@drawable/custom_edittext" android:drawableStart="@drawable/person_black" android:drawablePadding="8dp" android:hint="User Name" android:fontFamily="cursive" android:inputType="text" android:minHeight="48dp" android:paddingStart="20dp" android:paddingEnd="20dp" android:textColor="@color/black" />
<!-- password input feald --> <EditText android:id="@+id/password" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginStart="8dp" android:layout_marginEnd="8dp" android:layout_marginBottom="30dp" android:background="@drawable/custom_edittext" android:drawableStart="@drawable/lock_black" android:drawablePadding="8dp" android:hint="Password" android:fontFamily="cursive" android:inputType="textPassword" android:minHeight="48dp" android:paddingStart="20dp" android:paddingEnd="20dp" android:textColor="@color/black" />
<!-- login Button-->
<!-- For Testing Purpus I have added Sttings page Nav here --> <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton android:id="@+id/logingButton" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="60dp" android:layout_marginHorizontal="10dp" android:layout_marginBottom="10dp" android:backgroundTint="@color/DeepForestGreen" android:text="Login" android:textColor="@color/GoldYellow" android:fontFamily="cursive" android:textSize="18sp" app:cornerRadius="30dp" />
<!-- to sinup btn--> <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton style="@style/Widget.MaterialComponents.Button.TextButton" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="0dp" android:fontFamily="cursive" android:textAllCaps="false" android:id="@+id/signUpRederect" android:text="@string/not_yet_registered_sign_up_now" android:textColor="@color/Blue2" /> </LinearLayout> </androidx.cardview.widget.CardView>
</LinearLayout> </ScrollView> </LinearLayout>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools" android:id="@+id/main" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:background="@color/white" android:orientation="vertical" tools:context=".LoginActivity">
<!-- since some mobile phone screens small (spetialy my phone) bottom fetures dosent show so anable the scroll feture --> <!--TODO: Change Logo--> <ScrollView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:fillViewport="true">
<!-- Main Screen--> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_gravity="center" android:layout_marginTop="20dp" android:orientation="vertical" android:paddingBottom="20dp">
<!-- loging widget --> <androidx.cardview.widget.CardView style="@style/AppCard" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:padding="40dp">
<!-- Logo image--> <ImageView android:layout_width="140dp" android:layout_height="120dp" android:layout_gravity="center_horizontal" android:layout_marginTop="0dp" android:padding="0dp" app:srcCompat="@drawable/hsl_only_logo_transparent_black" /> <!-- login lable--> <TextView android:id="@+id/loginLable" style="@style/TitleText" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginBottom="40dp" android:text="@string/Login" />
<!-- User name input feald --> <EditText android:id="@+id/userName" style="@style/CustomEditText" android:drawableStart="@drawable/person_black" android:hint="User Name" android:inputType="text" />
<!-- password input feald --> <EditText android:id="@+id/password" style="@style/CustomEditText" android:layout_marginBottom="30dp" android:drawableStart="@drawable/lock_black" android:hint="Password" android:inputType="textPassword" />
<!-- login Button-->
<!-- For Testing Purpus I have added Sttings page Nav here --> <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton android:id="@+id/logingButton" style="@style/PrimaryButton" android:layout_marginHorizontal="10dp" android:layout_marginBottom="10dp" android:text="Login" />
<!-- to sinup btn--> <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton android:id="@+id/signUpRederect" style="@style/SecondaryButton" android:layout_marginTop="0dp" android:text="@string/not_yet_registered_sign_up_now" /> </LinearLayout> </androidx.cardview.widget.CardView>
</LinearLayout> </ScrollView> </LinearLayout>

option.name: originalContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools" android:id="@+id/main" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:background="@color/white" android:gravity="center_vertical" android:orientation="vertical" tools:context=".MainActivity">
<!-- Status Finished --> <LinearLayout android:id="@+id/splashImageContainer" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginHorizontal="10dp" android:layout_marginTop="20dp" android:orientation="vertical" android:padding="0dp">
<ImageView android:id="@+id/splashImage" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="264dp" android:layout_gravity="center_horizontal" android:layout_margin="3dp" android:layout_marginTop="0dp" app:srcCompat="@drawable/logo_only" /> </LinearLayout>
<LinearLayout android:id="@+id/txtwrapper" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginHorizontal="10dp" android:layout_marginTop="0dp" android:orientation="vertical" android:padding="0dp">
<TextView android:id="@+id/txtWelcome" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginStart="50dp" android:layout_marginEnd="50dp" android:layout_marginBottom="0dp" android:text="Welcome To" android:textAlignment="center" android:textColor="@color/NavyBlue" android:textSize="10sp" android:textStyle="italic" /> <!--Main Text--> <TextView android:id="@+id/txtHiddnsl" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginStart="50dp" android:layout_marginEnd="50dp" android:layout_marginBottom="0dp" android:fontFamily="cursive" android:text="@string/app_name" android:textAlignment="center" android:textColor="@color/NavyBlue" android:textSize="36sp" android:textStyle="bold" /> <!--Subtitle--> <TextView android:id="@+id/txtWondersBeyondtheGuidebook" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginStart="50dp" android:layout_marginEnd="50dp" android:layout_marginBottom="40dp" android:text="Wonders Beyond the Guidebook" android:textAlignment="center" android:textColor="@color/NavyBlue" android:textSize="10sp" android:textStyle="italic" />
</LinearLayout>
</LinearLayout>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools" android:id="@+id/main" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:background="@color/white" android:gravity="center_vertical" android:orientation="vertical" tools:context=".MainActivity">
<!-- Status Finished --> <LinearLayout android:id="@+id/splashImageContainer" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginHorizontal="10dp" android:layout_marginTop="20dp" android:orientation="vertical" android:padding="0dp">
<ImageView android:id="@+id/splashImage" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="264dp" android:layout_gravity="center_horizontal" android:layout_margin="3dp" android:layout_marginTop="0dp" app:srcCompat="@drawable/logo_only" /> </LinearLayout>
<LinearLayout android:id="@+id/txtwrapper" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginHorizontal="10dp" android:layout_marginTop="0dp" android:orientation="vertical" android:padding="0dp">
<TextView android:id="@+id/txtWelcome" style="@style/BodyText" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginStart="50dp" android:layout_marginEnd="50dp" android:layout_marginBottom="0dp" android:text="Welcome To" android:textSize="10sp" android:textStyle="italic" />
<!--Main Text--> <TextView android:id="@+id/txtHiddnsl" style="@style/TitleText" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginStart="50dp" android:layout_marginEnd="50dp" android:layout_marginBottom="0dp" android:text="@string/app_name" />
<!--Subtitle--> <TextView android:id="@+id/txtWondersBeyondtheGuidebook" style="@style/BodyText" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginStart="50dp" android:layout_marginEnd="50dp" android:layout_marginBottom="40dp" android:text="Wonders Beyond the Guidebook" android:textSize="10sp" android:textStyle="italic" />
</LinearLayout>
</LinearLayout>

option.name: originalContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools" android:id="@+id/main" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:background="@color/white" android:gravity="center_vertical" android:orientation="vertical" android:paddingStart="10dp" android:paddingEnd="10dp" tools:context=".OnboardingScreen2Activity">
<!-- TODO: Add Mor Iterms --> <!-- TODO: Experiment With Horicetal Scroll Viwe TODO: If possible move to Horisental Scroll weve-->
<ScrollView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:fillViewport="true">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="40dp" android:orientation="vertical" android:paddingBottom="20dp">
<TextView android:id="@+id/txtWelcome" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginStart="50dp" android:layout_marginEnd="50dp" android:layout_marginBottom="0dp" android:fontFamily="cursive" android:text="@string/discover_sri_lanka_s_hidden_wonders" android:textAlignment="center" android:textColor="@color/NavyBlue" android:textSize="20sp" android:textStyle="bold" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/txtWelcomedescript" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginStart="50dp" android:layout_marginTop="8dp" android:layout_marginEnd="50dp" android:layout_marginBottom="0dp" android:text="@string/simple_paragraph_1" android:textAlignment="center" android:textColor="@color/NavyBlue" android:textSize="12sp" android:textStyle="italic" />
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" />
<androidx.cardview.widget.CardView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_margin="30dp" app:cardBackgroundColor="@color/white" app:cardCornerRadius="30dp" app:cardElevation="20dp">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:orientation="vertical" android:padding="38dp">
<TextView android:id="@+id/sampleTxt" android:layout_width="171dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginStart="50dp" android:layout_marginEnd="50dp" android:layout_marginBottom="0dp" android:fontFamily="casual" android:text="Explore Attractions " android:textColor="@color/NavyBlue" android:textSize="16sp" android:textStyle="bold" />
<ImageView android:layout_width="264dp" android:layout_height="205dp" android:layout_gravity="center_horizontal" app:srcCompat="@raw/sigiriya" />
</LinearLayout> </androidx.cardview.widget.CardView>
<androidx.cardview.widget.CardView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_margin="30dp" app:cardBackgroundColor="@color/white" app:cardCornerRadius="30dp" app:cardElevation="20dp">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:orientation="vertical" android:gravity="center" android:padding="38dp">
<TextView android:id="@+id/sampleTxt2" android:layout_width="246dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginStart="50dp" android:layout_marginEnd="50dp" android:layout_marginBottom="0dp"
android:fontFamily="casual" android:text="Discover unique destinations ⛰️ " android:textColor="@color/NavyBlue" android:textSize="16sp" android:textStyle="bold" />
<ImageView android:layout_width="264dp" android:layout_height="205dp" android:layout_gravity="center_horizontal" app:srcCompat="@raw/polonnaruwa" />
</LinearLayout> </androidx.cardview.widget.CardView>
<com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton android:id="@+id/nextPageButton" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="50dp" android:layout_gravity="center_horizontal" android:layout_marginTop="0dp" android:layout_marginBottom="100dp" android:backgroundTint="@color/DeepForestGreen" android:onClick="LoginPage" android:fontFamily="cursive" android:textColor="@color/GoldYellow" android:text="Let's Go" android:textSize="18sp" app:cornerRadius="20dp" />
</LinearLayout> </ScrollView> </LinearLayout>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools" android:id="@+id/main" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:background="@color/white" android:gravity="center_vertical" android:orientation="vertical" android:paddingStart="10dp" android:paddingEnd="10dp" tools:context=".OnboardingScreen2Activity">
<ScrollView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:fillViewport="true">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="40dp" android:orientation="vertical" android:paddingBottom="20dp">
<TextView android:id="@+id/txtWelcome" style="@style/HeadingText" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginStart="50dp" android:layout_marginEnd="50dp" android:layout_marginBottom="0dp" android:text="@string/discover_sri_lanka_s_hidden_wonders" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/txtWelcomedescript" style="@style/BodyText" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginStart="50dp" android:layout_marginTop="8dp" android:layout_marginEnd="50dp" android:layout_marginBottom="0dp" android:text="@string/simple_paragraph_1" android:textSize="12sp" android:textStyle="italic" />
<androidx.cardview.widget.CardView style="@style/AppCard" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:orientation="vertical" android:padding="38dp">
<TextView android:id="@+id/sampleTxt" style="@style/HeadingText" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginBottom="10dp" android:fontFamily="casual" android:text="Explore Attractions " android:textSize="16sp" />
<ImageView android:layout_width="264dp" android:layout_height="205dp" android:layout_gravity="center_horizontal" app:srcCompat="@raw/sigiriya" />
</LinearLayout> </androidx.cardview.widget.CardView>
<androidx.cardview.widget.CardView style="@style/AppCard" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:orientation="vertical" android:gravity="center" android:padding="38dp">
<TextView android:id="@+id/sampleTxt2" style="@style/HeadingText" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginBottom="10dp" android:fontFamily="casual" android:text="Discover unique destinations ⛰️" android:textSize="16sp" />
<ImageView android:layout_width="264dp" android:layout_height="205dp" android:layout_gravity="center_horizontal" app:srcCompat="@raw/polonnaruwa" />
</LinearLayout> </androidx.cardview.widget.CardView>
<com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton android:id="@+id/nextPageButton" style="@style/PrimaryButton" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="50dp" android:layout_gravity="center_horizontal" android:layout_marginTop="0dp" android:layout_marginBottom="100dp" android:onClick="LoginPage" android:text="Let's Go" android:textSize="18sp" />
</LinearLayout> </ScrollView> </LinearLayout>

option.name: originalContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <androidx.drawerlayout.widget.DrawerLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools" android:id="@+id/drawer_layout" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:fitsSystemWindows="true" tools:context=".SettingsActivity">
<!-- Navigation View --> <com.google.android.material.navigation.NavigationView android:id="@+id/nav_view" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:layout_gravity="start" android:fitsSystemWindows="true" app:headerLayout="@layout/hedder" app:menu="@menu/main_menue" />
<!-- Main content area --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:layout_marginTop="5dp" android:orientation="vertical" android:background="@color/white">
<!-- Toolbar --> <com.google.android.material.appbar.MaterialToolbar android:id="@+id/toolbar" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="81dp" android:background="@color/toolbar_background_color" android:elevation="4dp" android:theme="@style/ToolbarTheme" app:contentInsetEnd="16dp" app:menu="@menu/settings_toolbar_menu" app:popupTheme="@style/ThemeOverlay.AppCompat.Light" />
<ScrollView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:fillViewport="true">
<!-- actual content of page , with scrollable --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:padding="16dp">
<!-- Text Wrapper --> <LinearLayout android:id="@+id/txtwrapper_main" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:gravity="center_vertical" android:orientation="horizontal" android:paddingTop="20dp" android:paddingBottom="4dp">
<TextView android:id="@+id/txtanableDarkTheam" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_gravity="center_vertical" android:layout_weight="1" android:paddingStart="16dp" android:paddingEnd="8dp" android:text="Enable Dark Theme" android:textColor="@color/NavyBlue" android:textSize="16sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:fontFamily="cursive" />
<com.google.android.material.switchmaterial.SwitchMaterial android:id="@+id/switch_them" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_gravity="center_vertical" android:layout_marginEnd="40dp" app:thumbTint="@color/GoldYellow" app:trackTint="@color/DeepForestGreen" android:textOff="OFF" android:textOn="ON" /> </LinearLayout>
<TextView android:id="@+id/txtNewfeature" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:layout_gravity="center_vertical" android:layout_marginTop="100dp" android:paddingStart="16dp" android:paddingEnd="8dp" android:text="New Features are coming Soon..." android:textColor="@color/NavyBlue" android:textSize="16sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:fontFamily="monospace" />
</LinearLayout> </ScrollView> </LinearLayout>
</androidx.drawerlayout.widget.DrawerLayout>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <ScrollView xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:fillViewport="true" android:background="@color/white" tools:context=".SettingsActivity">
<!-- Content of Settings page --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:padding="16dp">
<!-- Text Wrapper --> <LinearLayout android:id="@+id/txtwrapper_main" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:gravity="center_vertical" android:orientation="horizontal" android:paddingTop="20dp" android:paddingBottom="4dp">
<TextView android:id="@+id/txtanableDarkTheam" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_gravity="center_vertical" android:layout_weight="1" android:paddingStart="16dp" android:paddingEnd="8dp" android:text="Enable Dark Theme" android:textColor="@color/NavyBlue" android:textSize="16sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:fontFamily="cursive" />
<com.google.android.material.switchmaterial.SwitchMaterial android:id="@+id/switch_them" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_gravity="center_vertical" android:layout_marginEnd="40dp" app:thumbTint="@color/GoldYellow" app:trackTint="@color/DeepForestGreen" android:textOff="OFF" android:textOn="ON" /> </LinearLayout>
<TextView android:id="@+id/txtNewfeature" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_gravity="center_vertical" android:layout_marginTop="100dp" android:paddingStart="16dp" android:paddingEnd="8dp" android:text="New Features are coming Soon..." android:textColor="@color/NavyBlue" android:textSize="16sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:fontFamily="monospace" />
</LinearLayout> </ScrollView>

option.name: originalContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools" android:id="@+id/main" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:background="@color/white" android:orientation="vertical" tools:context=".SignUpActivity">
<!-- since some mobile phone screens small (spetialy my phone) bottom fetures dosent show so anable the scroll feture
TODO: Add Database Funtionality to thhis-->
<ScrollView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:fillViewport="true">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:paddingBottom="20dp">
<!-- for logo image--> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginHorizontal="10dp" android:layout_marginTop="20dp" android:orientation="vertical" android:padding="0dp">
</LinearLayout>
<!-- loging widget --> <androidx.cardview.widget.CardView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_margin="30dp" app:cardBackgroundColor="@color/white" app:cardCornerRadius="30dp" app:cardElevation="30dp">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:padding="40dp">
<ImageView android:layout_width="140dp" android:layout_height="120dp" android:layout_gravity="center_horizontal" android:layout_marginTop="0dp" android:padding="0dp"
app:srcCompat="@drawable/hsl_only_logo_transparent_black" /> <!-- login lable--> <TextView android:id="@+id/signUpLable" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginBottom="40dp" android:text="Sign Up" android:fontFamily="cursive"
android:textAlignment="center" android:textColor="@color/NavyBlue" android:textSize="36sp" android:textStyle="bold" />
<!-- User name input feald --> <EditText android:id="@+id/userName" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginStart="8dp" android:layout_marginEnd="8dp" android:layout_marginBottom="20dp" android:background="@drawable/custom_edittext" android:drawableStart="@drawable/person_black" android:drawablePadding="8dp" android:hint="User Name" android:inputType="text" android:fontFamily="cursive"
android:minHeight="48dp" android:paddingStart="20dp" android:paddingEnd="20dp" android:textColor="@color/black" />
<!-- password input feald --> <EditText android:id="@+id/password" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginStart="8dp" android:layout_marginEnd="8dp" android:layout_marginBottom="30dp" android:background="@drawable/custom_edittext" android:drawableStart="@drawable/lock_black" android:drawablePadding="8dp" android:hint="New Password" android:inputType="textPassword" android:fontFamily="cursive"
android:minHeight="48dp" android:paddingStart="20dp" android:paddingEnd="20dp" android:textColor="@color/black" /> <!-- Veryfy Password --> <EditText android:id="@+id/rePassword" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginStart="8dp" android:layout_marginEnd="8dp" android:layout_marginBottom="30dp" android:background="@drawable/custom_edittext" android:drawableStart="@drawable/lock_black" android:drawablePadding="8dp" android:hint="Re Type Password" android:inputType="textPassword" android:minHeight="48dp" android:paddingStart="20dp" android:paddingEnd="20dp" android:fontFamily="cursive"
android:textColor="@color/black" /> <!-- Email Input--> <EditText android:id="@+id/email" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginStart="8dp" android:layout_marginEnd="8dp" android:layout_marginBottom="30dp" android:background="@drawable/custom_edittext" android:drawableStart="@drawable/email_icon" android:drawablePadding="8dp" android:hint="Your Email Address" android:inputType="textEmailAddress" android:minHeight="48dp" android:fontFamily="cursive" android:paddingStart="20dp" android:paddingEnd="20dp" android:textColor="@color/black" />
<!-- login Button--> <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton android:id="@+id/signUpButton" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="60dp" android:layout_marginHorizontal="10dp" android:layout_marginBottom="10dp" android:backgroundTint="@color/DeepForestGreen" android:text="Sign Up" android:textSize="18sp" android:fontFamily="cursive" android:textColor="@color/GoldYellow" app:cornerRadius="30dp" />
<!-- Alredy Registerd Button--> <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton style="@style/Widget.MaterialComponents.Button.TextButton" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="0dp" android:id="@+id/loginRedirectText" android:onClick="toLogin" android:fontFamily="cursive" android:textAllCaps="false" android:text="Already Registered? Log in Now" android:textColor="@color/Blue2" /> </LinearLayout> </androidx.cardview.widget.CardView>
</LinearLayout> </ScrollView> </LinearLayout>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools" android:id="@+id/main" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:background="@color/white" android:orientation="vertical" tools:context=".SignUpActivity">
<ScrollView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:fillViewport="true">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:paddingBottom="20dp">
<androidx.cardview.widget.CardView style="@style/AppCard" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:padding="40dp">
<ImageView android:layout_width="140dp" android:layout_height="120dp" android:layout_gravity="center_horizontal" android:layout_marginTop="0dp" android:padding="0dp" app:srcCompat="@drawable/hsl_only_logo_transparent_black" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/signUpLable" style="@style/TitleText" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginBottom="40dp" android:text="Sign Up" />
<EditText android:id="@+id/userName" style="@style/CustomEditText" android:drawableStart="@drawable/person_black" android:hint="User Name" android:inputType="text" />
<EditText android:id="@+id/password" style="@style/CustomEditText" android:drawableStart="@drawable/lock_black" android:hint="New Password" android:inputType="textPassword" />
<EditText android:id="@+id/rePassword" style="@style/CustomEditText" android:drawableStart="@drawable/lock_black" android:hint="Re Type Password" android:inputType="textPassword" />
<EditText android:id="@+id/email" style="@style/CustomEditText" android:layout_marginBottom="30dp" android:drawableStart="@drawable/email_icon" android:hint="Your Email Address" android:inputType="textEmailAddress" />
<com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton android:id="@+id/signUpButton" style="@style/PrimaryButton" android:layout_marginHorizontal="10dp" android:layout_marginBottom="10dp" android:text="Sign Up" />
<com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton android:id="@+id/loginRedirectText" style="@style/SecondaryButton" android:layout_marginTop="0dp" android:onClick="toLogin" android:text="Already Registered? Log in Now" /> </LinearLayout> </androidx.cardview.widget.CardView>
</LinearLayout> </ScrollView> </LinearLayout>

option.name: originalContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools" android:id="@+id/main" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:background="@color/white" android:gravity="center_vertical" android:orientation="vertical" android:paddingStart="10dp" android:paddingEnd="10dp" tools:context=".WelcomeActivity">
<ImageView android:id="@+id/splashImageView" android:layout_width="256dp" android:layout_height="208dp" android:layout_gravity="center_horizontal" android:layout_margin="40dp" android:contentDescription="@drawable/hsl_only_logo_transparent_black" android:scaleType="centerCrop" app:srcCompat="@drawable/hsl_only_logo_transparent_black" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/txtWelcome" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginHorizontal="50dp" android:layout_marginBottom="40dp" android:fontFamily="cursive" android:text="@string/uncover_the_wonders_beyond_the_guidebook" android:textAlignment="center" android:textColor="@color/NavyBlue" android:textSize="20sp" android:textStyle="bold" />
<com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton android:id="@+id/nextPageButton" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="50dp" android:layout_gravity="center_horizontal" android:layout_marginTop="0dp" android:layout_marginBottom="100dp" android:backgroundTint="@color/DeepForestGreen" android:onClick="exploreShere" android:text="@string/next" android:textColor="@color/GoldYellow" android:fontFamily="cursive" android:textSize="18sp" app:cornerRadius="20dp" />
</LinearLayout>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools" android:id="@+id/main" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:background="@color/white" android:gravity="center_vertical" android:orientation="vertical" android:paddingStart="10dp" android:paddingEnd="10dp" tools:context=".WelcomeActivity">
<ImageView android:id="@+id/splashImageView" android:layout_width="256dp" android:layout_height="208dp" android:layout_gravity="center_horizontal" android:layout_margin="40dp" android:contentDescription="@drawable/hsl_only_logo_transparent_black" android:scaleType="centerCrop" app:srcCompat="@drawable/hsl_only_logo_transparent_black" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/txtWelcome" style="@style/HeadingText" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginHorizontal="50dp" android:layout_marginBottom="40dp" android:text="@string/uncover_the_wonders_beyond_the_guidebook" />
<com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton android:id="@+id/nextPageButton" style="@style/PrimaryButton" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="50dp" android:layout_gravity="center_horizontal" android:layout_marginTop="0dp" android:layout_marginBottom="100dp" android:onClick="exploreShere" android:text="@string/next" app:cornerRadius="20dp" />
</LinearLayout>

option.name: originalContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <resources>
<!-- TODO: Remove Un Nessosory Colors --> <!-- TODO : CleanUp -->
<!-- Main Colors--> <color name="black">#FF000000</color> <color name="white">#FFFFFFFF</color> <color name="blue">#2196F3</color> <color name="yellow">#FFC107</color> <color name="red">#F20000</color> <color name="lBlue">#00BCD4</color> <color name="light_gray">#C8C8C8</color> <color name="green">#4CAF50</color> <color name="lGreen">#6AE76A</color> <color name="pink">#E91E63</color> <color name="orange">#FF5722</color> <color name="Blue2">#0E28EB</color>
<!-- Primary Color Pallet--> <!-- Background --> <!-- The main background for all screens--> <color name="offWhite">#F8F8F8</color> <!-- Text--> <!-- All main body text, descriptions, and labels.--> <color name="NavyBlue">#2C3E50 </color>
<!-- Primary Button--> <!-- Primary buttons-->
<color name="DeepForestGreen">#3A6B35 </color>
<!-- Secondary buttons or links--> <color name="Tanbrown">#B38867 </color>
<!-- Highlight--> <!-- The "Add to Favorites" icon after it has been selected.--> <!-- Star ratings for locations.--> <!-- Highlighting a special feature or a new "pro" tip within a description.--> <color name="GoldSand">#D4A373 </color> <color name="GoldYellow">#FFAE00 </color>
<!-- Transparent Colors --> <color name="white_transparent">#80FFFFFF</color> <color name="black_transparent">#80000000</color> <color name="green_transparent">#804CAF50</color> <color name="Blue2_Transparent">#800E28EB</color> <color name="lBlue_transparent">#8000BCD4</color> <color name="yellow_transparent">#66FFC107</color> <color name="orange_transparent">#80FF5722</color>
<!--Extreen Transparency --> <color name="white_ex_trans">#10FFFFFF</color> <color name="green_ex_trans">#104CAF50</color> <color name="yellow_ex_trans">#4DFFC107</color>
<!-- Random Color--> <!----> <color name="toolbar_background_color">#FFFFFF</color> ```
</resources>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <resources>
<!-- Primary Color Palette for Hidden Sri Lanka--> <!-- Background Colors--> <color name="white">#FFFFFFFF</color> <color name="black">#FF000000</color> <color name="offWhite">#F8F8F8</color>
<!-- Brand Colors--> <!-- Primary text, headings, and main UI elements--> <color name="NavyBlue">#2C3E50</color>
<!-- Primary buttons and forest-themed elements--> <color name="DeepForestGreen">#3A6B35</color>
<!-- Secondary buttons and links--> <color name="Tanbrown">#B38867</color>
<!-- Accent colors for highlights, ratings, and special features--> <color name="GoldSand">#D4A373</color> <color name="GoldYellow">#FFAE00</color>
<!-- Secondary action color--> <color name="Blue2">#0E28EB</color>
<!-- Utility Colors (only keep what's actually used)--> <color name="light_gray">#C8C8C8</color> <color name="toolbar_background_color">#FFFFFF</color>
<!-- Transparent Colors (only commonly used ones)--> <color name="white_transparent">#80FFFFFF</color> <color name="black_transparent">#80000000</color>
</resources>

option.name: originalContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <resources>
<!-- Base application theme with consistent color scheme --> <style name="AppTheme" parent="Theme.MaterialComponents.DayNight.DarkActionBar"> <item name="colorPrimary">@color/DeepForestGreen</item> <item name="colorPrimaryVariant">@color/NavyBlue</item> <item name="colorOnPrimary">@color/GoldYellow</item> <item name="colorSecondary">@color/GoldSand</item> <item name="colorSecondaryVariant">@color/Tanbrown</item> <item name="colorOnSecondary">@color/NavyBlue</item> <item name="android:colorBackground">@color/white</item> <item name="colorSurface">@color/white</item> <item name="colorOnSurface">@color/NavyBlue</item> </style>
<!-- Toolbar Theme --> <style name="ToolbarTheme" parent="ThemeOverlay.MaterialComponents.Toolbar.Primary"> <item name="colorOnPrimary">@color/NavyBlue</item> <item name="android:textColorPrimary">@color/NavyBlue</item> </style>
<!-- Primary Button Style --> <style name="PrimaryButton" parent="Widget.MaterialComponents.Button"> <item name="android:layout_width">match_parent</item> <item name="android:layout_height">60dp</item> <item name="android:fontFamily">cursive</item> <item name="android:textSize">18sp</item> <item name="backgroundTint">@color/DeepForestGreen</item> <item name="android:textColor">@color/GoldYellow</item> <item name="cornerRadius">30dp</item> </style>
<!-- Secondary Button Style --> <style name="SecondaryButton" parent="Widget.MaterialComponents.Button.TextButton"> <item name="android:layout_width">match_parent</item> <item name="android:layout_height">wrap_content</item> <item name="android:fontFamily">cursive</item> <item name="android:textAllCaps">false</item> <item name="android:textColor">@color/Blue2</item> </style>
<!-- Primary Text Style --> <style name="PrimaryText"> <item name="android:textColor">@color/NavyBlue</item> <item name="android:fontFamily">cursive</item> <item name="android:textAlignment">center</item> </style>
<!-- Title Text Style --> <style name="TitleText" parent="PrimaryText"> <item name="android:textSize">36sp</item> <item name="android:textStyle">bold</item> </style>
<!-- Heading Text Style --> <style name="HeadingText" parent="PrimaryText"> <item name="android:textSize">20sp</item> <item name="android:textStyle">bold</item> </style>
<!-- Body Text Style --> <style name="BodyText" parent="PrimaryText"> <item name="android:textSize">14sp</item> <item name="android:fontFamily">monospace</item> </style>
<!-- Custom EditText Style --> <style name="CustomEditText"> <item name="android:layout_width">match_parent</item> <item name="android:layout_height">wrap_content</item> <item name="android:background">@drawable/custom_edittext</item> <item name="android:drawablePadding">8dp</item> <item name="android:fontFamily">cursive</item> <item name="android:minHeight">48dp</item> <item name="android:paddingStart">20dp</item> <item name="android:paddingEnd">20dp</item> <item name="android:textColor">@color/NavyBlue</item> <item name="android:layout_marginStart">8dp</item> <item name="android:layout_marginEnd">8dp</item> <item name="android:layout_marginBottom">20dp</item> </style>
<!-- Card Style (main Card Style for all boxes)--> <style name="AppCard" parent="Widget.MaterialComponents.CardView"> <item name="cardBackgroundColor">@color/white</item> <item name="cardCornerRadius">30dp</item> <item name="cardElevation">20dp</item> <item name="android:layout_margin">30dp</item> </style>
<!-- Styles for About Us Page --> <style name="AboutPage.TextView.Base" parent="Widget.AppCompat.TextView"> <item name="android:layout_width">match_parent</item> <item name="android:layout_height">wrap_content</item> <item name="android:layout_marginStart">50dp</item> <item name="android:layout_marginEnd">50dp</item> <item name="android:textAlignment">center</item> <item name="android:textColor">@color/NavyBlue</item> </style>
<style name="AboutPage.TextView.Title" parent="AboutPage.TextView.Base"> <item name="android:fontFamily">cursive</item> <item name="android:textSize">20sp</item> <item name="android:textStyle">bold</item> <item name="android:layout_marginBottom">40dp</item> </style>
<style name="AboutPage.TextView.Mission" parent="AboutPage.TextView.Base"> <item name="android:fontFamily">monospace</item> <item name="android:textSize">20sp</item> <item name="android:textStyle">bold</item> <item name="android:layout_marginBottom">10dp</item> </style>
<style name="AboutPage.TextView.Paragraph" parent="AboutPage.TextView.Base"> <item name="android:fontFamily">monospace</item> <item name="android:textSize">14sp</item> <item name="android:textStyle">italic</item> <item name="android:layout_marginBottom">40dp</item> </style>
<style name="AboutPage.Button.Link" parent="Widget.MaterialComponents.Button.TextButton"> <item name="android:layout_width">match_parent</item> <item name="android:layout_height">wrap_content</item> <item name="android:layout_marginStart">40dp</item> <item name="android:layout_marginEnd">40dp</item> <item name="android:layout_marginTop">0dp</item> <item name="android:fontFamily">monospace</item> <item name="android:textColor">@color/Blue2</item> <item name="android:textSize">12sp</item> <item name="android:textStyle">bold</item> </style>
<!-- Toolbar Title Appearance Style --> <style name="ToolbarTitleAppearance" parent="TextAppearance.Widget.AppCompat.Toolbar.Title"> <item name="android:textColor">@color/NavyBlue</item> <item name="android:textSize">20sp</item> <item name="android:fontFamily">cursive</item> <item name="android:textStyle">bold</item> <item name="android:gravity">center_vertical</item> </style>
</resources>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <resources>
<!-- Base application theme with consistent color scheme --> <style name="AppTheme" parent="Theme.MaterialComponents.DayNight.DarkActionBar"> <item name="colorPrimary">@color/DeepForestGreen</item> <item name="colorPrimaryVariant">@color/NavyBlue</item> <item name="colorOnPrimary">@color/GoldYellow</item> <item name="colorSecondary">@color/GoldSand</item> <item name="colorSecondaryVariant">@color/Tanbrown</item> <item name="colorOnSecondary">@color/NavyBlue</item> <item name="android:colorBackground">@color/white</item> <item name="colorSurface">@color/white</item> <item name="colorOnSurface">@color/NavyBlue</item> </style>
<!-- Toolbar Theme --> <style name="ToolbarTheme" parent="ThemeOverlay.MaterialComponents.Toolbar.Primary"> <item name="colorOnPrimary">@color/NavyBlue</item> <item name="android:textColorPrimary">@color/NavyBlue</item> </style>
<!-- Primary Button Style --> <style name="PrimaryButton" parent="Widget.MaterialComponents.Button"> <item name="android:layout_width">match_parent</item> <item name="android:layout_height">60dp</item> <item name="android:fontFamily">cursive</item> <item name="android:textSize">18sp</item> <item name="backgroundTint">@color/DeepForestGreen</item> <item name="android:textColor">@color/GoldYellow</item> <item name="cornerRadius">30dp</item> </style>
<!-- Secondary Button Style --> <style name="SecondaryButton" parent="Widget.MaterialComponents.Button.TextButton"> <item name="android:layout_width">match_parent</item> <item name="android:layout_height">wrap_content</item> <item name="android:fontFamily">cursive</item> <item name="android:textAllCaps">false</item> <item name="android:textColor">@color/Blue2</item> </style>
<!-- Primary Text Style --> <style name="PrimaryText"> <item name="android:textColor">@color/NavyBlue</item> <item name="android:fontFamily">cursive</item> <item name="android:textAlignment">center</item> </style>
<!-- Title Text Style --> <style name="TitleText" parent="PrimaryText"> <item name="android:textSize">36sp</item> <item name="android:textStyle">bold</item> </style>
<!-- Heading Text Style --> <style name="HeadingText" parent="PrimaryText"> <item name="android:textSize">20sp</item> <item name="android:textStyle">bold</item> </style>
<!-- Body Text Style --> <style name="BodyText" parent="PrimaryText"> <item name="android:textSize">14sp</item> <item name="android:fontFamily">monospace</item> </style>
<!-- Custom EditText Style --> <style name="CustomEditText"> <item name="android:layout_width">match_parent</item> <item name="android:layout_height">wrap_content</item> <item name="android:background">@drawable/custom_edittext</item> <item name="android:drawablePadding">8dp</item> <item name="android:fontFamily">cursive</item> <item name="android:minHeight">48dp</item> <item name="android:paddingStart">20dp</item> <item name="android:paddingEnd">20dp</item> <item name="android:textColor">@color/NavyBlue</item> <item name="android:layout_marginStart">8dp</item> <item name="android:layout_marginEnd">8dp</item> <item name="android:layout_marginBottom">20dp</item> </style>
<!-- Card Style (main Card Style for all boxes)--> <style name="AppCard" parent="Widget.MaterialComponents.CardView"> <item name="cardBackgroundColor">@color/white</item> <item name="cardCornerRadius">30dp</item> <item name="cardElevation">20dp</item> <item name="android:layout_margin">30dp</item> </style>
<!-- Styles for About Us Page --> <style name="AboutPage.TextView.Base" parent="Widget.AppCompat.TextView"> <item name="android:layout_width">match_parent</item> <item name="android:layout_height">wrap_content</item> <item name="android:layout_marginStart">50dp</item> <item name="android:layout_marginEnd">50dp</item> <item name="android:textAlignment">center</item> <item name="android:textColor">@color/NavyBlue</item> </style>
<style name="AboutPage.TextView.Title" parent="AboutPage.TextView.Base"> <item name="android:fontFamily">cursive</item> <item name="android:textSize">20sp</item> <item name="android:textStyle">bold</item> <item name="android:layout_marginBottom">40dp</item> </style>
<style name="AboutPage.TextView.Mission" parent="AboutPage.TextView.Base"> <item name="android:fontFamily">monospace</item> <item name="android:textSize">20sp</item> <item name="android:textStyle">bold</item> <item name="android:layout_marginBottom">10dp</item> </style>
<style name="AboutPage.TextView.Paragraph" parent="AboutPage.TextView.Base"> <item name="android:fontFamily">monospace</item> <item name="android:textSize">14sp</item> <item name="android:textStyle">italic</item> <item name="android:layout_marginBottom">40dp</item> </style>
<style name="AboutPage.Button.Link" parent="Widget.MaterialComponents.Button.TextButton"> <item name="android:layout_width">match_parent</item> <item name="android:layout_height">wrap_content</item> <item name="android:layout_marginStart">40dp</item> <item name="android:layout_marginEnd">40dp</item> <item name="android:layout_marginTop">0dp</item> <item name="android:fontFamily">monospace</item> <item name="android:textColor">@color/Blue2</item> <item name="android:textSize">12sp</item> <item name="android:textStyle">bold</item> </style>
<!-- Toolbar Title Appearance Style --> <style name="ToolbarTitleAppearance" parent="TextAppearance.Widget.AppCompat.Toolbar.Title"> <item name="android:textColor">@color/NavyBlue</item> <item name="android:textSize">20sp</item> <item name="android:fontFamily">cursive</item> <item name="android:textStyle">bold</item> <item name="android:gravity">center_vertical</item> <item name="android:layout_gravity">center_vertical</item> </style>
</resources>

option.name: originalContent
option.value:
<resources xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools">
<!-- TODO: Check Here -->
<!-- Base application theme. --> <style name="Base.Theme.HiddenSriLanka" parent="Theme.Material3.DayNight.NoActionBar"> <!-- Customize your light theme here. --> <!-- <item name="colorPrimary">@color/my_light_primary</item> --> </style> <style name="ToolbarTheme" parent="ThemeOverlay.AppCompat.Light"> <item name="android:textColorPrimary">@android:color/black</item> <item name="colorControlNormal">@android:color/black</item> </style> <style name="Theme.HiddenSriLanka" parent="Base.Theme.HiddenSriLanka" /> </resources>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<resources xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools">
<!-- Base application theme. --> <style name="Base.Theme.HiddenSriLanka" parent="Theme.Material3.DayNight.NoActionBar"> <!-- Apply your consistent color scheme --> <item name="colorPrimary">@color/DeepForestGreen</item> <item name="colorPrimaryVariant">@color/NavyBlue</item> <item name="colorOnPrimary">@color/GoldYellow</item> <item name="colorSecondary">@color/GoldSand</item> <item name="colorSecondaryVariant">@color/Tanbrown</item> <item name="colorOnSecondary">@color/NavyBlue</item> <item name="android:colorBackground">@color/white</item> <item name="colorSurface">@color/white</item> <item name="colorOnSurface">@color/NavyBlue</item> </style>
<style name="Theme.HiddenSriLanka" parent="Base.Theme.HiddenSriLanka" /> </resources>
